metadata.title: CVE-2024-55553 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In FRRouting (FRR) before 10.3, it is possible for an attacker to triggerrepeated RIB revalidation by sending approximately 500 RPKI updates,potentially leading to prolonged revalidation times and a Denial of Service(DoS) scenario.

criterions.comment: quagga package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
